issue.title: [CF 700] Tracking spell power
issue.body:
Hello,

I'm trying to get an icon containing the actual SP value to be shown, if my spell power exceeds a certain amount (by procs etc.).
Thus I added a Condition Icon with the according condition, but I just can't get it to work properly. The icon is always shown, no matter how much spell power I have.

Is it a problem with DogTag (what  to use)?

Export string:
^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Sconditionicon ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N2^S[Stacks:Hide(0)] ^t^t^t^SShowWhen^N3 ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SSPELLDMG ^SOperator^S> ^SLevel^N22000 ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SUnAlpha^N0 ^SEnabled^B ^t^N60447^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

Cheers!

comments.body:
Not sure if you're still having issues with this. I've tried your TMW icon for spell power - it's very nice - thank you for it. A couple of things, your intial threshold is likely too low. Raid buffs will move it over that threshold as such it will stay on all the time. I've set mine to 30k. It works very nicely.


> Posted by CurseForge user Iannet

I've kind of replaced this very icon by the AffDots addon, thus I haven't checked for a long time. The threshold was fine back in November. I had checked it without any raid buffs, just with procs raising my spell power above threshold. Great that it works for you though!


> Posted by CurseForge user NirrAVEN

Sorry for never getting to this ticket. Since it seems now that you no longer have a need for this, I will be closing it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
